# CleanCar Classifier Project - COMPLETE ✅

## Project Overview
React web application for classifying car make/model from uploaded photos and checking California Clean Car tax benefit eligibility.

## Technology Stack
- React 18 with Vite
- Tailwind CSS (custom beige/green/coffee color scheme)
- Lucide React icons  
- CNN model integration (trained in Google Colab)
- Firebase backend (placeholder)

## Next Steps

To integrate your trained CNN model:
1. Deploy model to cloud API endpoint
2. Update `src/services/modelService.js` lines 10-11
3. Test with real car images
